programmes.show_description: Join us as we showcase products that help people with reduced mobility enjoy an active lifestyle. From mobility scooters to sound amplifiers, our range can help people improve their quality of life.
Join designer Kim Mendelson as she presents her latest lines. Daytime chic to evening sophistication, weekend comfort to party glamour, the Kim & Co collection is designed for every aspect of life.
Elevate your cooking with Caso! Discover innovative kitchen gadgets and appliances designed to make meal prep easier, tastier, and more enjoyable for every home chef.
